name: Shrink Demo (Ludum Dare​ 38)
description:
A first-person puzzler with a shrink mechanic. Use keyboard and mouse. Can you escape? (Avg. Playtime 5-10 min)

Our first game jam game for Ludum Dare 38 - 2017! Enjoy.

WebGL Version Here - https://raudaschl.itch.io/shrink-demo-ludum-dare-38-webgl

Ludum Dare - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/shrink-1
